Name: Restore default settings
Description: Can I restore the default settings of the developer tools?
Author: @pankajparashar
@kilianvalkhof

Chrome.Notes: To restore the default theme, placement, tools order, and any other customised settings, select Settings > Preferences > Restore defaults and reload.

Edge.Notes: To restore the default theme, placement, tools order, and any other customised settings, select Settings > Preferences > Restore defaults and refresh.

Opera.Notes: To restore the default theme, placement, tools order, and any other customised settings, select Settings > Preferences > Restore defaults and reload.

Polypane.Notes: In the Help menu, select "Delete settings and restart".
